description:
In this course titled ' Learn 6 Proven Principles Of Persuasion And Influence.' By Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn -

6 proven principles that are important for persuasion and influence. These 6 principles underline almost all our decisions. We respond to these principles emotionally and yet most people are completely unaware of how strongly these principles drive them to make decisions. Learn those influential principles in this course.

You will learn how to relax and anchor confidence in your daily life and tough situations. It is useful for people who are into sales , marketing , public speakers, stage performers who are required to improve and enhance their persuasion and influencing skills to get the desired results.

This course contains 6 powerful principles which are live recorded by the lecturer into 10 lectures in English.

The techniques are easy to understand and result oriented to benefit the students and bring a change in their life.
title: Learn 6 Proven Principles Of Persuasion And Influence
